alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 10:38PM CST until January 29 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam affecting Washington, Choctaw and Clarke Counties. For the Tombigbee River...including Coffeeville Dam, Leroy...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, pastureland becomes flooded. Livestock should be moved to higher ground. Old Ferry Road near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 24.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 29.1 feet early Sunday morning. It will fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
